He used to compose a poem in late spring, saying.
"The grass is deep and the landscape is heavy with smoke.
The forest is luxuriant and the setting sun is faint.
Flowers still fall without rain.
Without the wind, the flotsam flies on its own.
It was the second year of Shaoxing.
The Gaozong emperor visited Yuanjuesi.
He personally sprayed his office desk with this.
He wrote this one-liner, saying.
